hints.content:
![](${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/22a3bd60a651375070a06af3814c8573.png)

We can take apart $\green{9}$ to make $\pink7$ and $\blue2$.  
We can put together $\pink7$ and $\blue2$ to make $\green{9}$.

question.content:
**Fill in the blanks.**  

 | | |
:-: | :-: | :-:
$9-7=$ [[☃ input-number 1]] | because | [[☃ input-number 2]] $+$ $7=9$
